name: Teddy Yum
description:
Help teddy prepare for hibernation and eat all the food! :)
Developed by SippSoup
This is my first game! :)

Browser only works in Firefox, otherwise download the game .zip below!

Controls:
WASD - Move
E - Accept
ESC - Back
SHIFT - Run

Credits:
SketchyMacro - Developer & Artist
Jalecko - coding help
